attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS!
attributes.review: This app is horrible it took four days to download and every time I went on it the app would glitch I’m just hoping that I can delete it before it hacks my phone, which happened to my friend and it won’t take forever to delete!

attributes.title: Don’t not recommend
attributes.review: I was trying to see if I could get a different perspective on our President but this app ruined my phone and it won’t turn on and it has a virus that can lose all your info and data and someone can steal your identity.

attributes.title: This app sexually assaulted me
attributes.review: I warn you anyone who dare tries to download the app. You will be met by a a huge download time and it will slowly start stealing carat and selling it to the Russian data base. Within two weeks all your personal information will be leaked to Russian intelligence and they will find you.

attributes.title: ✨awful, dont download💖
attributes.review: I can’t believe I downloaded this ✨waste of space.🧚 Don’t waste your time, literally anything else is a better way to spend your time. This app told me not to wear a mask in public to protect myself and others 😭✋ anyways remember to report trump’s twt as well, babes 💖

attributes.title: No English
attributes.review: I just downloaded the app and when I opened it, it was in English I mean can you believe these people how dare they make the app English I don’t even know how to read or write in English. Please next time when making an app please put it in kutenai so I can understand.

attributes.title: This app is terrible!
attributes.review:
Seriously? I can’t even look at the products without giving my phone number? 
Y’all are so worried about the government tracking and making us wear masks, meanwhile the president is asking for your phone number to track you RIGHT HERE. 🤬

attributes.title: don’t take away our stuff🥳🤩!!!!
attributes.review: this app took absolutely forever to download. i waited 4 months and nothing happened!!! it lagged so much and viruses kept getting on my phone. and the notifications were horrendously annoying!! do NOT download this app!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: Please do not get this app, it starless your information, and it took 7 hours to download that’s ridiculous!! I don’t Suggest this at all the app doesn’t even run correctly I open it and it just goes to a black screen it’s so stupid and I’m extremely disappointed

attributes.title: i tried
attributes.review: this was me trying to give someone a second chance and then i realized that our president is an idiot and is so selfish this app shows how he only cares for himself, I MEAN ITS A APP ABOUT THE PRESIDENT i wanted to see maybe hell do things differently and ill come out with a different opinion on him but nah just didnt work.

attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I wish I could leave a zero star review, I downloaded this app to see if there’s anything good about our president, my phone started acting all glitchy and trying to make me racist. I would not download this app if I were you, the person that’s for is a child rapist.
